name: Export Customers Data
author: Fahad Mahmood

sections.description:
WooCommerce is an awesome eCommerce plugin that allows you to sell anything. This plugin will help you to export customers data in CSV format.

  • Author: Fahad Mahmood

  • Project URI: http://androidbubble.com/blog/wordpress/plugins/export-customers-data

Tags

woocommerce, orders, users, customers, data

License

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. There will now be a Split icon in the to Woocommerce order overview page within the order actions.
sections.faq:
1. How to export customers data using this plugin?
    Answer: Open settings page by clicking Export Customers menu under the WooCommerce menu. The settings page will appear. Select data you want to export and click Export Data button.

  2. In which format data will be exported?
    Answer: The plugin export data in an excel sheet.
